pages.title: Ender Dropper
pages.text: The Ender Dropper is the counterpart to the $(l:magical_blocks/ender_hopper)Ender Hopper$(). With every $(thing)redstone pulse$() it ejects an item from your personal $(item)Ender Chest$().$(br2)Beware: Who's stopping anyone from placing a button next to it and emptying your $(item)Ender Chest$()?

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Ender Dropper only works while you are online.
